snippet: Even many of those who support phasing out nuclear plants after the Fukushima disaster see a temporary need for them.
abstract: Japan is grappling with issue of whether or not to continue its reliance on nuclear power after Fukushima plant disaster; while some fear future disasters, others see inexpensive nuclear power as essential to economic growth and an ability to compete with China.
lead_paragraph: Even many of those who support phasing out nuclear plants after the Fukushima disaster see a temporary need for them.

headline.main: Nuclear Issue in Limbo as Indecision Grips Japan
headline.print_headline: Nuclear Issue in Limbo as Indecision Grips Japan
